original_text: And Joshua made peace with them and made a covenant with them, to let them live, and the leaders of the congregation swore to them.
korean_text: 여호수아가 곧 그들과 화친하여 그들을 살리리라는 조약을 맺고 회중 족장들이 그들에게 맹세하였더라

sentences.original_text: And Joshua made peace with them
and made a covenant with them
and the leaders of the congregation swore to them
